action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image appears to be an abstract collection of pixelated shapes in various colors. There are four distinct shapes, each a different color: purple, green, pink, and orange. Each shape has a jagged, Tetris-like appearance. The purple shape resembles a cross or a plus sign, the green shape looks like a zigzag or a staircase, the pink shape is similar to a T or a hammer, and the orange shape also has a zigzag or lightning bolt pattern. The background is white, and the shapes do not touch each other.
continue

DESCRIPTION: The image is a pixelated composition with various colored blocks arranged in a seemingly random pattern. There is a purple cross at the top, followed by a series of green, orange, pink, and yellow blocks that form irregular shapes and lines. The overall image does not immediately resemble any recognizable object or figure.
